name: Jolteon Star
author: Masakazu Fukuda

poke_power.name: Yellow Ray
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn, when you put Jolteon Star from your hand onto your Bench, you may put 1 damage counter on each Active Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s).

attacks.name: Agility
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, prevent all effects of an attack, including damage, done to Jolteon Star during your opponent’s next turn.

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 Pokémon Star in your deck.
